definition: to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)

sentences.english: God will permit nothing to hinder what he plans to do.
sentences.chinese: 神绝不会容许受任何事物去拦阻祂的筹算。

sentences.english: Why does He permit lingering weakness to hinder the sweet service I long to render to His poor servants?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他应许缠绵的软弱来拦阻我去事奉他呢？

sentences.english: If you choose to be saved, no devil can stop you from being saved.
sentences.chinese: 如果你选择要得救，没有任何邪恶势力能拦阻你得救。

sentences.english: High friction levels of the standing hair fibers (nylon) effectively prevent mud sliding sideways .
sentences.chinese: 立毛纤维之高摩擦力，有效拦阻污泥防止侧漏。

sentences.english: Once, he encountered preclusion from riots and terrorists in these countries.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在这些国家遭遇到暴乱和恐怖分子的拦阻。

sentences.english: Considering the kink-wave passing, the impact load and aircraft deceleration were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 计算作用在拦阻钩上的冲击载荷和飞机的减速过程。

sentences.english: I know that you can do all things; no plan of yours can be thwarted.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你万事都能作，你的计画都不能被拦阻。

sentences.english: I tried to stop her, but she elbowed me out of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我企图拦阻她，但她用肘把我搡开。

sentences.english: Space to destroy buildings on the road to block the monsters.
sentences.chinese: 空格键可以击毁路上的建造物来拦阻怪物一段时间。

sentences.english: The design and calculation of arresting net are the difficult and focal point of this kind of project.
sentences.chinese: 拦阻网主索的设计计算是此类工程的难点和重点。

sentences.english: Short ground take off. Equipped with an arresting hook allowing a short landing.
sentences.chinese: 短地面起飞距离，装备一个拦阻钩允许短距离降落。

definition: forced submission/to exploit advantage to force sb to do one's bidding
to stop/to obstruct/to bar the way
to shout at sb to stop
to make sth difficult/to create obstacles
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
to overpower/to overwhelm/to subdue/to check/to control
to shout an order or command
